languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас в упор глазами, темными словно два омута.{/n} "Мир обречен — со всеми, кто на нем находится. Исчезновение звезды стало последним толчком к гибели, последним аккордом в планах культа Последнего восхода. Когда-то я видел подобное — мир, сдавшийся слугам {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} и позволивший скверне проникнуть слишком глубоко. Сейчас миллионы людей бьют челом тем, кто обещал им спасение, и добровольно отдают свои души Хаосу. Жертва, достаточная для порождения демонического мира".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас в упор глазами, темными словно два омута.{/n} "Мир обречен — со всеми, кто на нем находится. Исчезновение звезды стало последним толчком к гибели, последним аккордом в планах Культа Последнего восхода. Когда-то я видел подобное — мир, сдавшийся слугам {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} и позволивший скверне проникнуть слишком глубоко. Сейчас миллионы людей бьют челом тем, кто обещал им спасение, и добровольно отдают свои души Хаосу. Жертва, достаточная для порождения демонического мира".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас в упор глазами, темными словно два омута.{/n} "Мир обречен — со всеми, кто на нем находится. Исчезновение звезды стало последним толчком к гибели, последним аккордом в планах культа Последнего восхода. languages.text: {n}海因里希的黑眼睛，像两潭深邃的池水一样，坚决地盯着你。{/n}“这个世界注定毁灭，所有居民都难逃一死。这颗行星本身的毁灭，是它迈向消亡的最后一步，也是‘终末黎明’教派计划的最后一步。我曾目睹过类似的世界，那个世界已经被腐化得过于严重，落入了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}仆人们的手中。此时此刻，几百万人正跪在那些承诺会给他们救赎的人面前，对他们俯首称臣。他们甘愿将自己的灵魂交给混沌。如此规模庞大的牺牲，足以将恶魔世界召唤而来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的黑眼睛，像两潭深邃的池水一样，坚决地盯着你。{/n}“这个世界注定毁灭，所有居民都难逃一死。这颗行星本身的毁灭，是它迈向消亡的最后一步，也是‘终末黎明’教派计划的最后一步。我曾目睹过类似的世界，那个世界已经被腐化得过于严重，落入了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}仆人们的手中。此时此刻，几百万人正跪在那些承诺会给他们救赎的人面前，对他们俯首称臣。他们甘愿将自己的灵魂交给混沌。如此规模庞大的牺牲，足以将恶魔世界召唤而来。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの目は、深く暗い2つの洞のように、断固としてあなたを見つめている。{/n}「この惑星は破滅の運命にあります。そして、その住人たちも。星の消滅は死への最後の後押しであり、『最後の夜明け魔女団』の計画の最終章でもあるのです。我はかつて、同じような出来事を目撃しました。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の下僕に屈服し、腐敗が深く入り込むことを許した惑星を。今この瞬間、何百万人もの人々が、救いを約束した者の前にひれ伏し、自らの魂を進んで渾沌に捧げているのです。これは、悪魔惑星を生み出すのに十分な犠牲だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの目は、深く暗い2つの洞のように、断固としてあなたを見つめている。{/n}「この惑星は破滅の運命にある。そして、その住人たちも。星の消滅は死への最後の後押しであり、『最後の夜明け』教団の計画の最終章でもあるのだ。私はかつて、同じような出来事を目撃した。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の下僕に屈服し、腐敗が深く入り込むことを許した惑星をだ。今この瞬間、何百万人もの人々が、救いを約束した者の前にひれ伏し、自らの魂を進んで渾沌に捧げているのだぞ。これは、ディーモンの惑星を生み出すのに十分な犠牲だ」

{n}ハインリックスの目は、深く暗い2つの洞のように、断固としてあなたを見つめている。{/n}「この惑星は破滅の運命にあります。そして、その住人たちも。星の消滅は死への最後の後押しであり、『最後の夜明け魔女団』の計画の最終章でもあるのです。我はかつて、同じような出来事を目撃しました。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の下僕に屈服し、腐敗が深く入り込むことを許した惑星を。今この瞬間、何百万人もの人々が、救いを約束した者の前にひれ伏し、自らの魂を進んで渾沌に捧げているのです。これは、悪魔惑星を生み出すのに十分な犠牲だ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' tiefe, dunkle Augen fixieren dich.{/n} "Diese Welt ist dem Untergang geweiht – genau wie ihre Bewohner. Das Verschwinden des Sterns war der letzte Schritt Richtung Tod, das Finale der Pläne des Kults der letzten Dämmerung. Ich war einmal Zeuge eines ähnlichen Ereignisses – auf einer Welt, die sich den Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} ergeben hatte, sodass die Korruption zu tief eingedrungen war. In diesem Moment verbeugen sich Millionen vor jenen, die ihnen Erlösung versprochen haben, und übergeben ihre Seele willentlich dem Chaos. Und dieses Opfer ist groß genug, um eine Dämonenwelt hervorzubringen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' tiefe, dunkle Augen fixieren dich.{/n} "Diese Welt ist dem Untergang geweiht – genau wie ihre Bewohner. Das Verschwinden des Sterns war der letzte Schritt Richtung Tod, das Finale der Pläne des Kults der letzten Dämmerung. Ich war einmal Zeuge eines ähnlichen Ereignisses – auf einer Welt, die sich den Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} ergeben hatte, sodass die Korruption zu tief eingedrungen war. In diesem Moment verbeugen sich Millionen vor jenen, die ihnen Erlösung versprochen haben, und übergeben ihre Seele willentlich dem Chaos. Und dieses Opfer ist groß genug, um eine Dämonenwelt hervorzubringen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous fixe de ses yeux noirs et profonds.{/n} « Le monde est condamné, et ses habitants avec lui. La disparition de l'étoile a été le dernier pas en direction du précipice, le point d'orgue des machinations du Culte de l'Aube finale. J'ai déjà été témoin d'un événement similaire... un monde qui s'était abandonné aux serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} et avait laissé la corruption se répandre en profondeur. En ce moment même, des millions de gens se prosternent devant ceux qui leur ont promis le salut et remettent délibérément leurs âmes au Chaos. Ce sacrifice est suffisamment grand pour donner naissance à un monde-démon »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous fixe de ses yeux noirs et profonds.{/n} « Le monde est condamné, et ses habitants avec lui. La disparition de l'étoile a été le dernier pas en direction du précipice, le point d'orgue des machinations du culte de l'Aube finale. J'ai déjà été témoin d'un événement similaire... un monde qui s'était abandonné aux serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} et avait laissé la corruption se répandre en profondeur. En ce moment même, des millions de gens se prosternent devant ceux qui leur ont promis le salut et remettent délibérément leurs âmes au Chaos. Ce sacrifice est suffisamment grand pour donner naissance à un monde démon »

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Heinrix, como dos mares negros y profundos, se fijan en los tuyos.{/n} «Este mundo está condenado, y sus habitantes con él. La desaparición de la estrella fue el último empujón hacia la muerte, el culmen de los planes del Culto del Amanecer Final. Una vez fui testigo de un evento similar; un mundo que se rindió a los siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} y permitió que su corrupción se enquistara en él. En este momento, millones de personas se arrodillan frente a los que les prometen la salvación y están dispuestas a entregar sus almas al Caos. Es un sacrificio lo bastante poderoso como para dar lugar a un mundo daemon».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Heinrix, como dos mares negros y profundos, se fijan en los tuyos.{/n} «Este mundo está condenado, y sus habitantes con él. La desaparición de la estrella fue el último empujón hacia la muerte, el culmen de los planes del Culto del Amanecer Final. Una vez fui testigo de un evento similar; un mundo que se rindió a los siervos del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} y permitió que su corrupción se enquistara en él. En este momento, millones de personas se arrodillan frente a los que les prometen la salvación y están dispuestas a entregar sus almas al Caos. Es un sacrificio lo bastante poderoso como para dar lugar a un mundo daemon».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in derin ve karanlık havuzu andıran gözleri, kararlı bir şekilde sana sabitleniyor.{/n} "Gezegen, içinde yaşayanlarla birlikte yok oluşa mahkûm. Yıldızın ortadan kaybolması, gezegeni ölüme iten son darbe oldu. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın planlarının son perdesiydi bu. Daha önce benzer bir olaya tanık olmuştum. {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} hizmetkârlarına teslim olan ve yozluğun iliklerine işlemesine göz yuman bir dünya vardı. Şu anda milyonlarca insan, onlara kurtuluş vadedenlerin önünde diz çöküyor ve ruhlarını bile isteye Kaos'a teslim ediyor. Bir iblis dünyası tezahür ettirecek kadar büyük bir adaktır bu."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes, like two deep, dark pools, are resolutely fixed on you.{/n} "The world is doomed — and its inhabitants along with it. The disappearance of the star was the final nudge toward death, the finale of the Cult of the Final Dawn's plans. I once witnessed a similar event — a world that had surrendered to the servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} and permitted corruption to enter too deep. At this moment, millions of people are bowing down before those who promised them salvation, and they are willingly giving over their souls to Chaos. A sacrifice great enough to bring forth a daemon world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in derin ve karanlık havuzu andıran gözleri, kararlı bir şekilde sana sabitleniyor.{/n} "Gezegen, içinde yaşayanlarla birlikte mahvoldu. Yıldızın ortadan kaybolması, gezegeni ölüme iten son darbe oldu. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın planlarının son perdesiydi bu. Daha önce benzer bir olaya tanık olmuştum. {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın hizmetkârlarına teslim olan ve yozlaşmanın derinlere tesir etmesine göz yuman bir dünya vardı. Şu anda milyonlarca insan, onlara kurtuluş vaat edenlerin önünde diz çöküyor ve ruhlarını bile isteye Kaos'a teslim ediyor. Bir iblis dünyası tezahür ettirecek kadar büyük bir adak."
